title: TOURNAMENT THIS WEEKEND, NEED PLAYERS
body:
Hello! I am looking for players to join a ranked team for the tournament this weekend. We currently require a top laner and 1-2 substitutes. If you are interested about winning prizes and competing in a tournament add me in game.

IGN:UrbanAngel

replies.body:
Hi what is the team like
do we get to practice 1st or no?
when is it?
etc

I'd include a lot more details regarding your tournament in your OP. 

What are the prizes you are referring to? 

What are the who/what/when/where/hows of the tournie? 

Who is the team? 

And so on. Good luck but I'd definitely write your post out like an advert for the tournie!
hi what are the prizes and what time is this a link wold be good if you have one I play top
